titles.title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 324 Main Street in Grambling, Louisiana, shall be known and designated as the "Coach Eddie Robinson Post Office Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 9/30/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 324 Main Street in Grambling, Louisiana, as the "Coach Eddie Robinson Post Office Building."
